hackathon-description-text: A hackathon to create ideas that can make an impact in Pakistan and the world.
hackathon-rules: Every team is required to submit their idea to challengepost

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
-Did you work or interact with colleagues in another city? How did you collaborate and communicate?
     -What tools did you use to collaborate (e.g Github, Pakathon Forum, Skype

-Share the bios of your team and tell us why you are the right people to be working on this 
     -What is the project you are working on?
     -Demonstrate evidence of progress over the weekend

-What is the size of the market or the number of people impacted?
     -How do you plan on reaching your target audience?
     -How do you plan on making this financially sustainable?

hackathon-description-header: Empowering Pakistanis to be change agents around the world
